GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix use-after-free in ufx_ops_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit 347a969b130c2a496f471f14b354119b82664f0a. For more details please see the references link.
